mil3.1.4:1.2: “pandito kho ayam bhikkhu patibalo maya saddhim sallapitum, bahukani ca me thanani pucchitabbani bhavissanti, yava apucchitaniyeva tani thanani bhavissanti, atha suriyo attham gamissati, yannunaham sve antepure sallapeyyan”ti.
mil3.1.4:2.2: “tena hi tvam, devamantiya, bhadantassa aroceyyasi ‘sve antepure ranna saddhim sallapo bhavissati’”ti.
mil3.1.4:2.3: Idam vatva milindo raja utthayasana theram nagasenam apucchitva ratham abhiruhitva “nagaseno nagaseno”ti sajjhayam karonto pakkami.
mil3.1.4:3.1: Atha kho devamantiyo ayasmantam nagasenam etadavoca—
mil3.1.4:3.5: Atha kho tassa rattiya accayena devamantiyo ca anantakayo ca mankuro ca sabbadinno ca yena milindo raja tenupasankamimsu, upasankamitva rajanam milindam etadavocum—
mil3.1.4:3.9: “Yattake bhikkhu icchati, tattakehi bhikkhuhi saddhim agacchatu”ti.
mil3.1.4:4.4: “yattake bhikkhu icchati, tattakehi bhikkhuhi saddhim agacchatu”ti.
mil3.1.4:4.8: “yattake bhikkhu icchati, tattakehi bhikkhuhi saddhim agacchatu”ti.
mil3.1.4:4.11: “Sabbo panayam sakkaro patiyadito, aham bhanami ‘yattake bhikkhu icchati, tattakehi bhikkhuhi saddhim agacchatu’ti.
mil3.1.4:4.12: Ayam bhane sabbadinno annatha bhanati, kim nu mayam nappatibala bhikkhunam bhojanam datun”ti?
mil3.1.4:5.1: Atha kho devamantiyo ca anantakayo ca mankuro ca yenayasma nagaseno tenupasankamimsu, upasankamitva ayasmantam nagasenam etadavocum—
mil3.1.4:5.3: ‘yattake bhikkhu icchati, tattakehi bhikkhuhi saddhim agacchatu’”ti.
mil3.1.4:5.4: Atha kho ayasma nagaseno pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya asitiya bhikkhusahassehi saddhim sagalam pavisi.
mil3.1.4:6.1: Atha kho anantakayo ayasmantam nagasenam nissaya gacchanto ayasmantam nagasenam etadavoca—
mil3.1.4:6.2: “bhante nagasena, yam panetam brusi ‘nagaseno’ti, katamo ettha nagaseno”ti?
mil3.1.4:6.5: “Yo so, bhante, abbhantare vato jivo pavisati ca nikkhamati ca, so ‘nagaseno’ti mannami”ti.
mil3.1.4:6.6: “Yadi paneso vato nikkhamitva nappaviseyya, pavisitva na nikkhameyya, jiveyya nu kho so puriso”ti?
mil3.1.4:6.8: “Ye panime sankhadhamaka sankham dhamenti, tesam vato puna pavisati”ti?
mil3.1.4:6.10: “Ye panime vamsadhamaka vamsam dhamenti, tesam vato puna pavisati”ti?
mil3.1.4:6.12: “Ye panime singadhamaka singam dhamenti, tesam vato puna pavisati”ti?
mil3.1.4:6.15: “Naham patibalo taya vadina saddhim sallapitum, sadhu, bhante, attham jappehi”ti.
mil3.1.4:6.16: “Neso jivo, assasapassasa namete kayasankhara”ti thero abhidhammakatham kathesi.
